## Acceptance Criteria

## Pre-review checklist:

- [ ] Tests

- [ ] Documentation

- [ ] Analytics (user analytics, e.g. Google Analytics)

- [ ] Observability (metrics/tracing)

- [ ] Feature flag

## Testing information

- Is there any special setup required?

- Test plan?

## Test:

- [ ] Tested locally

- Platforms/Browsers:

  - [ ] Google Chrome (latest version)

  - [ ] Internet Explorer 11

  - [ ] Edge

- Accessibility:

  - [ ] Screen Reader

  - [ ] Keyboard Navigation

  - [ ] Magnification

  - [ ] Contrast

  - [ ] Text size 200%

  - [ ] Touch target areas (Mobile)

  - [ ] Landscape (Mobile)
